ygData.subject: I got an idea!
ygData.msgSnippet: About the teleporting thing.  If they want to teleport, give them strict rules to follow. Since teleporting is a shift in the fabric of time and space, there

About the teleporting thing.  If they want to teleport, give them 
strict rules to follow. Since teleporting is a shift in the fabric of 
time and space, there will be a soft audiable sound to let others now 
that a shift happened.  But this sound is soft, so a bot may or 
maynot hear it depending on the situation.

Also, During a fight, the teleport is an action.  Therefore once a 
bot teleports, they must wait for their opponant to respond before 
making another move.

And when teleporting, a bot may not teleport more than 50 feet at a 
time.  
Since people want to be able to teleport try this on and tell me what 
you think))))


Predacon: Shoots at Maximal.

Maximal: Teleports behind Predacon before shot hit.(teleport is one 
action)

Predacon:: hears the sound and turns to face the Maximal.(reaction to 
move) Aims gun and fires at Maximal.(one action)

Maximal:: Maximal teleports before shot hits and is now behind the 
Predacon again.

Predacon:: hears sound, turns and sweeps the legs of the Maximal.

Maximal:: falls down from leg sweep and draws sword.(reaction to 
move) Slashes at Predacon.(one action)

Predacon:: Sword cuts chest plate but not that deep.(reaction to 
move) Teleports 35 feet away from Maximal(teleport is one action).

Maximal:: Teleports to behind Predacon.(teleport is one action)

This is just an example of how this may work if this is allowed into 
the rules.  But if one bot gains teleporting capabilities, then 
others will have to be able to deside if this is a good thing for 
thier characters or not.  his may benefit some characters, but not 
others.  This is only my humble suggestion.  I leave it up to the 
Council to have the final say on this matter.

AND NOW ON WITH THE RPG!
